--- title: Tabular model keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A basic model that can be used on tabular data" --- 
from nbdev.showdoc import *

Model¶

emb_sz_rule[source]

emb_sz_rule(n_cat)

Rule of thumb to pick embedding size corresponding to n_cat

get_emb_sz[source]

get_emb_sz(to, sz_dict=None)

Get default embedding size from TabularPreprocessor proc or the ones in sz_dict

class TabularModel[source]

TabularModel(emb_szs, n_cont, out_sz, layers, ps=None, embed_p=0.0, y_range=None, use_bn=True, bn_final=False) :: Module

Basic model for tabular data.

Integration example with training¶

from fastai2.data.all import *
from fastai2.tabular.core import *
from fastai2.optimizer import *
from fastai2.learner import *
from fastai2.metrics import *
from fastai2.callback.all import *

path = untar_data(URLs.ADULT_SAMPLE)
df = pd.read_csv(path/'adult.csv')

cat_names = ['workclass', 'education', 'marital-status', 'occupation', 'relationship', 'race']
cont_names = ['age', 'fnlwgt', 'education-num']
procs = [Categorify, FillMissing, Normalize]
splits = RandomSplitter()(range_of(df))

to = TabularPandas(df, procs, cat_names, cont_names, y_names="salary", splits=splits)

trn_dl = TabDataLoader(to.train, bs=64, num_workers=0, shuffle=True, drop_last=True)
val_dl = TabDataLoader(to.valid, bs=128, num_workers=0)
dbunch = DataBunch(trn_dl, val_dl)
dbunch.show_batch()
workclass education marital-status occupation relationship race age_na fnlwgt_na education-num_na age fnlwgt education-num salary
0 Self-emp-not-inc Assoc-voc Never-married Farming-fishing Own-child White False False False 35.000000 147258.000990 11.0 <50k
1 Private HS-grad Married-civ-spouse Handlers-cleaners Husband White False False False 68.000001 76371.000709 9.0 >=50k
2 Private 11th Never-married Other-service Own-child White False False False 20.000000 204225.999381 7.0 <50k
3 Private Doctorate Never-married Exec-managerial Not-in-family White False False False 52.000000 110977.001878 16.0 >=50k
4 Private Doctorate Married-civ-spouse Prof-specialty Wife White False False False 37.000000 333305.005168 16.0 <50k
5 Self-emp-not-inc HS-grad Never-married Craft-repair Other-relative Amer-Indian-Eskimo False False False 39.000000 107233.001460 9.0 <50k
6 Self-emp-inc Some-college Married-civ-spouse Sales Husband White False False False 54.000000 138851.999511 10.0 >=50k
7 Private Some-college Never-married Adm-clerical Not-in-family White False False False 32.000000 211027.999572 10.0 <50k
8 Private 9th Married-civ-spouse Craft-repair Husband White False False False 27.000000 116207.001211 5.0 <50k
9 Self-emp-not-inc 10th Married-civ-spouse Sales Husband White False False False 38.000000 122493.002267 6.0 >=50k 
model = TabularModel(get_emb_sz(to), len(to.cont_names), 2, [200,100])

opt_func = partial(Adam, wd=0.01, eps=1e-5)
learn = Learner(dbunch, model, CrossEntropyLossFlat(), opt_func=opt_func, metrics=accuracy)

learn.fit_one_cycle(1)
epoch train_loss valid_loss accuracy time
0 0.348242 0.363722 0.828010 00:32
